title: Did the U.S. Food and Drug Administration declare a ban on total toothpaste in Colgate?
subtitle: :: A widely shared article that obtains some critical facts wrong about September 2016, FDA ruling on the use of triclusan.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In June 2017, FDA announced that it would prohibit the use of triclusan in various products, including Colgate Tutal.
